name: Road To Salvation
description:
Road To Salvation is a stylized action-adventure game set in the 80s.
The world is destroyed in the game. In these years of survival of the strong, your daughter was kidnapped.

You will try to save your daughter safely.
You will arrange and make many agreements.
In these wars where you will return from the dead, your closest comrade has been yours.'Your car.'

Very careful not to lose what you have while searching for your daughter.
This is where you need to produce your own bombs and make the most appropriate choices.

Good luck with the adventure because it won't be easy
